---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

Load R-Scripts in a separate R code chunk.

```{r}
source('../srcR/my_world.R')
```

Use RStudio for working with RMarkdown files.

```{r}
myName <- "John"
hello_world(myName)
```

## Preview Output

Press `Ctrl + Shift + K` to preview RMarkdown files. Use `Ctrl + S` to save current changes and reload preview.

## Run All Code Chunks

Press `Ctrl + Alt + R` to run all R code chunks.
